Gordon Enterprises LLC

Start-up Incubation

If you have a compelling early stage business idea but need funding, legal guidance, connections or some know-how outside of your area of expertise? We would love to help.

We are constantly investigating the latest technology for business administration, internal commmunication, advertising and customer analytics with years of experience managing and integrating them into an operational business.

Administration Assistance

What most entrepreneurs go through once when forming a business, we have done time and time again. We will guide you through the incorporation process, picking the best business type, securing the IP protections and licenses, secure document storage, custom email domains, accounting software and bank integrations and much more.

Creating

  • Incorporation Assistance
  • Legal Compliance
  • Licensing
  • Employee Contracts

Cross-Industry Experts

We enjoy new experiences and especially challenging ones. We have worked with businesses ranging from sculpture artists to music studios, fintech start-ups and landscaping companies.

Working with businesses in all stages and sizes, you can rest assured knowing we treat your business like our own. After all, bringing our experience and knowledge to your passion is our specialty.

Tell us what your goals for your business are in your free consultation, we'll take care of the rest. It's really that easy.
